title: Earth 2150: Lost Souls
description:
Earth 2150: Lost Souls was the last game in the 2150 line, before the mediocre Earth 2160 was released. If you played 2160 and didn't like it, don't let that keep you from trying Lost Souls - it's a far superior game in every respect.


The graphics are a little dated, but not terrible, and the game features make up for the dated models:

1. Completely deformable terrain. Build trenches, smooth terrain for building.

2. Tunnels. A layer under the map allows you to build tunnels anywhere for surprise attacks.

3. Highly customizable units. Select the body, weapons, and shields of each of your units. Create massive mobile war platforms.

4. 3 distinct factions with different technology. While some basic weapons are shared, most of it is radically different, especially in the higher tiers. 



This version is complete, with nothing removed except that it includes only the english install. Movies, soundtrack, etc is all there. A cd key is not required, and it can be installed from your hard drive. Once installed, no cd or iso is required to play.

Includes manual in PDF form.

Enjoy.
